metadata.title: CVE-2023-34318 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A heap buffer overflow vulnerability was found in sox, in the startreadfunction at sox/src/hcom.c:160:41. This flaw can lead to a denial ofservice, code execution, or information disclosure.

criterions.comment: sox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
